div.p: MP4 video support
Support for self-hosted or external mp4 video files.
MP4 video support

Each video can contain a detailed description, the description can be formatted with CSS as you like. The description window and description button can be disabled individually for each video or globally for all video.
For more information about this please follow this link
Youtube video
Support for Youtube videos, this video is not part of a Youtube playlist.
Youtube single videos

Each video can contain a detailed description, the description can be formatted with CSS as you like. The description window and description button can be disabled individually for each video or globally for all video.
For more information about this please follow this link
Vimeo video
Support for Vimeo videos, this video is not part of a Vimeo playlist.
Vimeo video

Each video can contain a detailed description, the description can be formatted with CSS as you like. The description window and description button can be disabled individually for each video or globally for all video.
For more information about this please follow this link
Mp3 Audio
UVP can play mp3 files and visualize it in real time.
Mp3 Audio

Each video can contain a detailed description, the description can be formatted with CSS as you like. The description window and description button can be disabled individually for each video or globally for all video.
For more information about this please follow this link
HLS Live Streaming & m3u8
HTTP Live Streaming / HLS / m3u8 video support on all browsers.
HLS Live Streaming & m3u8

Each video can contain a detailed description, the description can be formatted with CSS as you like. The description window and description button can be disabled individually for each video or globally for all video.
For more information about this please follow this link
